channel.title: championship on chantal website
channel.description: Recent content in championship on chantal website

item.title: The 21th Women's Go National Championship - Women's Championship
item.description: Official Website http://www.haifong.org/?p=31188 Introduction The 21th Women’s Go National Championship was held for over 20 years. It encouraged women to play Go and enjoy it. We believed that several players have been so much love in playing Go and attracting more people to join in this interesting field. Therefore, we hold this tournament just for female players to give them a showcase to show their abilities.

item.title: The 15th World Students GO OZA Championship – Women's Championship
item.description: Official Website http://igooza.nikkei.co.jp/students/15th/index-we.htm Introduction The World Students GO OZA Championship is a championship in which 16 students chosen from various countries around the world, including from Asia, compete. It was founded in 2003, and the 15th championship will be held in February 2017. Not only the players but also the organizers are students: it’s an international championship run by students for students. Championship outline Name: The 15th World Students GO OZA Championship Organizer: The All-Japan Students GO Association / Nikkei Inc.

item.title: 2nd World Mind Sports Games – Women’s Individual Go Championship
item.description: Official Website & References [Official Website] http://www.imsaworld.com/wp/events-calendar/world-mind-sports-games-2012/ [Wikipedia] https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2012_World_Mind_Sports_Games Introduction The 2012 World Mind Sports Games were held in Lille, France, from 9 to 23 August 2012. The meet started during the 2012 Summer Olympics and ending shortly before the 2012 Summer Paralympics, both in London. This was the second rendition of the World Mind Sports Games, inaugurated 2008 in Beijing.
